vclaim: A copypasta meme accurately lists actor Jim Caviezel's injuries from filming the 2004 film "The Passion of the Christ."
title: Is This a Real List of Jim Caviezel’s Injuries from Filming ‘The Passion of the Christ’?
subtitle: Caviezel has not been shy about the physical toll of filming the 2004 movie.
author: Bethania Palma
